abstract_ssm: The Williamsburg Giglio Feast photographs date from 1949 and consist of two black-and-white photographic prints. One photograph shows three men standing near the Giglio tower on a street in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. The other photograph is a group portrait of seven men and one child dressed in Giglio related costumes posing in front of the base of the Giglio tower.
